import React from 'react' /* import Select from "react-select" */ import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { Fragment } from 'react' const defaultValues = { select: "", }; const FormularioAlumno = (props) => { const dataPostFormulario = { rut: '', nombre: '', correo: '', carrera: '', cantidad: '', electivo1: '', electivo2: '', electivo3: '', } //State const [formulario, setFormulario] = React.useState(dataPostFormulario) //Agregar usuarios const addUser = (user) =>{ user.id=uuidv4() setUsers([ ...users, user ]) } const {control, register, handleSubmit, formState:{ errors } } = useForm({defaultValues}); const onSubmit = (data, e)=>{ //console.log(data) props.addUser(data) e.target.reset() } return (

{errors.rut && errors.rut.message}

{errors.correo && errors.correo.message}
{errors.Carrera && errors.Carrera.message}

{errors.Cantidad && errors.Cantidad.message}

{errors.ESele1 && errors.ESele1.message}

{errors.ESele2 && errors.ESele2.message}

{errors.ESele3 && errors.Cantidad.message}

); } export default FormularioAlumno
